articles.title: The FUD Around Bitcoin Escalates Amid Amateurish Takes and the Imminent Ruling on Grayscale’s Lawsuit Against the SEC
articles.description:
At a time when global risk assets are bleeding due to an unholy convergence of China’s epic economic slowdown and resurgent inflation expectations across key markets on the back of […]

articles.description: Shares of EV leader Tesla have taken a beating for the past couple of weeks, for reasons related both to the company and to what is happening in financial markets, but a separate factor was pushing them down on Friday.

articles.author: Thomas Povéda
articles.title: Samsung : un capteur photo de 440 MP serait en préparation pour 2024
articles.description: Sur X, anciennement Twitter, un leaker affirme que Samsung prépare 3 capteurs photo pour 2024. L'un d'eux afficherait une définition de 440 mégapixels, plus de deux fois celle du Galaxy S23 Ultra, déjà très performant. Quand on pense à Samsung,...
